Package chinesecheckers.util

Class State

java.lang.Object
chinesecheckers.util.State
public class State extends Object
Keeps track of the state of the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

  • Constructor Details

    • State

      public State(ArrayList<Player> players, int maxDistance, int[][] directions)
      Creates an uninitialized state of a game.
      Parameters:
      players - the players of the game
      maxDistance - the max distance between a position and an end zone position
      directions - the directions in which a piece can move

    • State

      public State(State other)
      Creates a copy of the specified state.
      Parameters:
      other - a state to copy

    • State

      public State(State state, Move moveToApply)
      Creates a state with the copy constructor and applies a Move to the copied state.
      Parameters:
      state - the state to copy
      moveToApply - the move to apply on the copied state

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner(Player winner)
      Sets the winner of this game to the first Player that returns true from isWinner(Player)
      Parameters:
      winner - the winner

    • updateFarthestPositions

      public void updateFarthestPositions()
      Calculates and updates the position which its coordinates are farthest from some piece of a Player. This is calculated for every player. pre: should be calculated once, after initializing all positions, and before any move has been applied.

    • getNumOtherPiecesInEndZone

      public int getNumOtherPiecesInEndZone(Piece piece, Piece currentPiece)
      Calculates the number of positions in the end zone of piece that are not containing currentPiece.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to check its end zone
      currentPiece - the piece to not count its occurrences
      Returns:
      the number of positions

    • getMoveChain

      public List<VirtualPosition> getMoveChain(VirtualPosition destination)
      Takes a destination and calculates a path to the origin position. Destinations are leaves in the tree data structure this destinations and the root is the origin.
      Parameters:
      destination - the VirtualPosition to calculate the path for
      Returns:
      the path calculated

    • clearDestinations

      public void clearDestinations()
      Clears the destinations, to be used before calculating new destinations or after extracting all needed data.
      See Also:
      • State.PositionTreeNode

    • isDestination

      public boolean isDestination(VirtualPosition position)
      Checks whether a position is in the destinations data structure.
      Parameters:
      position - the position to check
      Returns:
      true if the position is a destination, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • VirtualPosition
      • State.PositionTreeNode

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner(Player player)
      Checks whether the Player has at least one piece in its end zone and that its end zone doesn't contain empty positions.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check win for
      Returns:
      true if the player won, false otherwise

    • addPosition

      public void addPosition(VirtualPosition position, Piece piece)
      Changes the position's owner and updates the player distance accordingly. for example when moving a piece or when initializing.
      Parameters:
      position - the position to change its owner to piece
      piece - the new owner of the position

    • removePosition

      public void removePosition(VirtualPosition position, Piece piece)
      Changes the position's owner and updates the player distance accordingly. for example when moving a piece.
      Parameters:
      position - the position to change its owner from piece
      piece - the previous owner of the position

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece(Move move)
      Updates this piecePositionMap according to the specified move.
      Parameters:
      move - the move to apply

    • updatePointPositionMap

      public void updatePointPositionMap()
      Updates a map from coordinates to virtual positions.
      See Also:
      • Coordinates
      • VirtualPosition

    • updateCenter

      public void updateCenter()
      Calculates and updates the position which its coordinates are closest to the average of all empty positions. pre: should be calculated once, after initializing all positions, and before any move has been applied.

    • addEndZonePosition

      public void addEndZonePosition(VirtualPosition position, Piece endZonePiece)
      Adds a single position to the map holding the end zone positions by piece. This method is called when initializing the state by Board.
      Parameters:
      position - the position to be added
      endZonePiece - the piece which position belongs to its end zone
      See Also:
      • VirtualPosition
      • Piece

    • distance

      public int distance(VirtualPosition position1, VirtualPosition position2)
      Calculates and the distance between two Position objects.
      Parameters:
      position1 - first position.
      position2 - second position.
      Returns:
      the distance between the positions.
      See Also:
      • VirtualPosition

    • distanceToFreeEndZone

      public int distanceToFreeEndZone(Piece piece, VirtualPosition origin)
      Calculates the number of steps from origin to the closest end zone position of piece, where a step is a move to a free or occupied neighbor position.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to calculate the distance to its end zone
      origin - the position to calculate the distance from
      Returns:
      the distance to the closest end zone position of piece
      See Also:
      • VirtualPosition

    • nextTurn

      public Player nextTurn()
      Returns:
      the next Player to make a move.

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn()
      Changes the turn to the next Player.

    • updateDestinations

      public void updateDestinations(VirtualPosition origin)
      Updates this.destinations to hold the set of destinations of legal moves that originate at origin.
      Parameters:
      origin - a position to update legal destinations for
      See Also:
      • VirtualPosition
      • State.PositionTreeNode

    • getDestinations

      public List<VirtualPosition> getDestinations()
      Extracts positions from last calculated destinations and returns them.
      Returns:
      a list containing the last calculated destinations for some chosen origin
      See Also:
      • VirtualPosition
      • State.PositionTreeNode

    • getMoves

      public Set<Move> getMoves(Piece piece)
      Takes a Piece and calculates all the possible moves originating at a position containing this piece.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to calculate moves for
      Returns:
      a set containing all possible moves of piece parameter
      See Also:
      • Move
